Package me.agno.gridjavacore.columns

Class GridColumnCollection<T>

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
java.util.HashMap<K,V>
java.util.LinkedHashMap<String,IGridColumn<T>>
me.agno.gridjavacore.columns.GridColumnCollection<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the grid data
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,IGridColumn<T>>, IGridColumnCollection<T>
public class GridColumnCollection<T> extends LinkedHashMap<String,IGridColumn<T>> implements IGridColumnCollection<T>
Represents a collection of grid columns in a grid.
See Also:
